attributes.action: The people request Her Majesty The Queen to exercise power of Royal Prerogative.
attributes.background: In extreme circumstances the monarch can dissolve Parliament single-handedly, on the condition "an occasion has arisen which there is fair reason the opinion of the House is not the opinion of the electors. Dissolution is necessary, whenever the wishes are different from the wishes of the nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487
